name: @reward-system/shared
description: Shared TypeScript types, constants, and utilities

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:compile && yarn build:fix
scripts.build:compile: npx tsc src/all-types.ts --declaration --outDir dist --skipLibCheck --module ES2022 --target ES2022 && npx tsc src/index.ts --declaration --outDir dist --skipLibCheck --module ES2022 --target ES2022
